FuncDef:
The cmd recording-scheme command sets a command recording scheme on the device.
The undo cmd recording-scheme command deletes the command recording scheme and disallow command recording.
By default, the commands that are run on the device. are not recorded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters. It should not contain slash (\), anti-slash (/), colon (:), asterisk (*), question mark (?), quotation mark ("), and angle brackets (< >).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By running the cmd recording-scheme command enables command recording on the Router, providing a reference for system monitor and fault location.
